data.title: Ripple's chief legal officer says ‘the SEC is getting battered in the court'
data.text: The credibility of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in the United States is being constantly tested, amid the regulator's scrutiny on the cryptocurrency industry.

data.title: Grayscale vs. SEC Decision Boosts XRP
data.text: XRP gets a new boost to help it grow. After the recent court decision in the Grayscale vs. SEC case regarding a spot Bitcoin ETF, XRP's value increased by more than 6%. The cryptocurrency market, especially XRP, benefited from this decision.

data.title: Ripple Transfers 31 Million XRP in Wake of Grayscale's SEC Legal Battle Victory
data.text: Ripple, a major playe­r in the cryptocurrency industry, has made he­adlines with its recent activity surrounding XRP. According to a report by Whale Alert, Ripple transfe­rred 31 million XRP tokens, which are value­d at approximately $16.5 million. These de­velopments have coincide­d with Grayscale's recent le­gal triumph over the U.S. Securitie­s and Exchange Commission (SEC).

data.title: Grayscale Considers Adding XRP to Fund After SEC Win
data.text: This legal triumph follows a similar win for Ripple, the company behind XRP, against the SEC. As a result, members of the XRP community are encouraging Grayscale to consider adding XRP back to its selection of cryptocurrencies in its investment fund.

data.title: Pro-XRP Attorneys, Ripple CLO, Analysts Weigh In On Coinbase Vs SEC Lawsuit Dismissal
data.text: After Grayscale Investments' landmark victory against the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), experts contemplate the court to approve the motion by crypto exchange Coinbase to dismiss the SEC lawsuit. data.title: XRP Lawyer Hints at How Coinbase Might Win in SEC Lawsuit
data.text: XRP holders' attorney John Deaton hints at a seeming edge that Coinbase has in the SEC lawsuit against it.
